## FlowEditorState.applyTheirs() method

Gets a new flow editor state, based on the current state, and with the specified operation applied.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
applyTheirs(operation: FlowOperation, theme: FlowTheme): FlowEditorState;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  operation | [FlowOperation](./scribing.flowoperation.md) | The operation to apply |
|  theme | [FlowTheme](./scribing.flowtheme.md) | Theme of the flow content |

<b>Returns:</b>

[FlowEditorState](./scribing.floweditorstate.md)
